item.description: Steelseries. It’s a name all gamers are familiar with, and it’s a company which deals with all aspects of a gamers needs by providing good quality peripherals and accessories. item.title: Apple Drops Cat Names with OS X Mavericks
item.author: Felix Technology,
item.description: At WWDC 2013, Appleannounced the upgrade to the Mountain Lion operating system, OS X Mavericks. Based on the new features, it seems that Apple have placed a lot of focus on productivity and ease of use with this OS. Amongst hundreds of new features, the key things to take away from the new release …

item.title: Tricks of the Trade: Saving on Tech
item.author: Felix Technology,
item.description: When it comes to new technology, it can often feel impossible to keep up with the Joneses. As soon as you’ve saved up enough money for one gadget, another brand spanking new one will come along and steal its ‘must-have’ crown. From televisions to tablets, scanners tospeakers – with this never-ending …

item.description: Last Friday three young whippersnappers (i.e. the Felix Tech team) made their way to the Gadget Show Live, in the ExCeL, hoping to see the newest tech on the market, as well as have some well-earned time off.
